column4: Anyone know how to refresh grub after attaching another drive with another OS on it so that when I use the menu it shows in the list of boot options?
manually edit the /boot/grub/menu.lst and add in a proper boot 'stanza' for the new ops
there may be some grub front ends.. but ive never seen a tool to 'scan and add newly found os's'  to grub
rember ' to alter SYSTEM FILES - you must do so as root'  Thus you need to use sudo to get root permissions
sudo COMMAND  - runs that command as root
